long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GameCenter is a custom new tab page that provides live statistics and scores for various sports leagues. It provides support for the four Major sports leagues NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB and College Basketball/Football and English Premier League. The extension features automatic background score refreshes, live scores and betting odds, top performers and quick access to ESPN GameCast. Users can customize their new tab page background image and all their own personal bookmarks to tailor their experience to their liking.
